messages.subject: Marty Dodd as Bardolf Gunwaldtsson
messages.msgSnippet: Here s what Marty and Keith were doing the past few days.  They re home safely and unloading the trailer (tents need to be dried out).    They re not photos of
messages.messageBody:
Here's what Marty and Keith were doing the past few days. They're
home safely and unloading the trailer (tents need to be dried
out). They're not photos of Keith or Marty. If any of those come
up I'll send a link, but for those wondering what older unschoolers
sometimes do for learning experiences, there's Marty Dodd's recent
activity.


http://www.flickr.com/photos/iaincaradoc/2273620449/in/
set-72157603934590995/

The second photo in that set, the people wearing green, that's our
kingdom. Marty says "That was the first march on the first day," and
they were farther back. He was wearing a black and gold tabard,
because he's on the baronial guard (local group's colors are black
and gold).

There are some photos of Marty in armor (and other SCA clothes and
times) here:
http://sandradodd.com/duckford/bardolf

Sandra
